edit.viewSettings.3D.origin.location.corner.bottomNorthwest = Bottom Northwest
edit.viewSettings.3D.origin.location.corner.bottomNortheast = Bottom Northeast

edit.viewSettings.3D.origin.location.corner.topSouthwest = Top Southwest

edit.viewSettings.3D.origin.location.edge.top = Top

edit.viewSettings.showTickCounter = Show tick counter
edit.viewSettings.tickCounterLabel = Tick counter label

edit.viewSettings.2D.patchSize = Patch size
edit.viewSettings.2D.patchSize.info = measured in pixels
edit.viewSettings.2D.fontSize = Font size
edit.viewSettings.2D.fontSize.info = of labels on agents
edit.viewSettings.2D.wrapX = World wraps horizontally
edit.viewSettings.2D.wrapY = World wraps vertically
edit.viewSettings.2D.frameRate = Frame rate
edit.viewSettings.2D.frameRate.info = Frames per second at normal speed

edit.viewSettings.2D.minPxcor = minimum x coordinate for patches
edit.viewSettings.2D.maxPxcor = maximum x coordinate for patches
edit.viewSettings.2D.minPycor = minimum y coordinate for patches
edit.viewSettings.2D.maxPycor = maximum y coordinate for patches

edit.viewSettings.3D.smooth = Smooth edges (slower)
edit.viewSettings.3D.affects = only affects 3D view
edit.viewSettings.3D.wireFrame = Show wire frame
edit.viewSettings.3D.fontSize.info = of labels on agents
edit.viewSettings.3D.dualView = Update 2D view
edit.viewSettings.3D.wrapX = World wraps X (east/west)
edit.viewSettings.3D.wrapY = World wraps Y (north/south)
edit.viewSettings.3D.wrapZ = World wraps Z (top/bottom)
edit.viewSettings.3D.minPxcor = minimum x coordinate for patches
edit.viewSettings.3D.maxPxcor = maximum x coordinate for patches
edit.viewSettings.3D.minPycor = minimum y coordinate for patches
edit.viewSettings.3D.maxPycor = maximum y coordinate for patches
edit.viewSettings.3D.minPzcor = minimum z coordinate for patches
edit.viewSettings.3D.maxPzcor = maximum z coordinate for patches

edit.hubnet.tag = Tag
edit.hubnet.view.width = Width (pixels)
edit.hubnet.view.height = Height (pixels)

# tools

tools.colorswatch.preview = Preview
tools.colorswatch.copy = Copy selected color
tools.colorswatch.numbers = Numbers
tools.colorswatch.increment = Increment

tools.shapesEditor.importFromModel = Import from Model...
tools.shapesEditor.importFromLibrary = Import from Library...
tools.shapesEditor.edit = Edit
tools.shapesEditor.new = New
tools.shapesEditor.delete = Delete
tools.shapesEditor.duplicate = Duplicate
tools.shapesEditor.info = (many more shapes are available in the library)
tools.shapesEditor.import.note = Import Shapes from Model
tools.shapesEditor.import.error = No shapes found in this file.

tools.sdm.diagram = Diagram
tools.sdm.stock = Stock
tools.sdm.variable = Variable
tools.sdm.flow = Flow
tools.sdm.link = Link
tools.sdm.check = Check
tools.sdm.edit = Edit
tools.sdm.delete = Delete
tools.sdm.dtNumberError = dt must be a number
tools.sdm.dtZeroError = dt must be greater than 0

tools.behaviorSpace.experiments = Experiments:
tools.behaviorSpace.new = New
tools.behaviorSpace.edit = Edit
tools.behaviorSpace.duplicate = Duplicate
tools.behaviorSpace.delete = Delete
tools.behaviorSpace.run = Run
tools.behaviorSpace.close = Close

tools.behaviorSpace.experimentName = Experiment name
tools.behaviorSpace.vary = Vary variables as follows (note brackets and quotation marks):

# this property extends across several lines, and has HTML breaks in it.
tools.behaviorSpace.vary.info = Either list values to use, for example:<br>\
["my-slider" 1 2 7 8]<br>\
or specify start, increment, and end, for example:<br>\
["my-slider" [0 1 10]] (note additional brackets)<br>\
to go from 0, 1 at a time, to 10.<br>\
You may also vary max-pxcor, min-pxcor, max-pycor, min-pycor, random-seed.

tools.behaviorSpace.repetitions = Repetitions
tools.behaviorSpace.repetitions.info = run each combination this many times
tools.behaviorSpace.metrics = Measure runs using these reporters:
# this property has an HTML break in it.
tools.behaviorSpace.metrics.info = one reporter per line; you may not split a reporter<br>across multiple lines
tools.behaviorSpace.runMetricsEveryStep = Measure runs at every step
tools.behaviorSpace.runMetricsEveryStep.info = if unchecked, runs are measured only when they are over
tools.behaviorSpace.setupCommands = Setup commands:
tools.behaviorSpace.goCommands = Go commands:
tools.behaviorSpace.exitCondition = Stop condition:
tools.behaviorSpace.exitCondition.info = the run stops if this reporter becomes true
tools.behaviorSpace.finalCommands = Final commands:
tools.behaviorSpace.finalCommands.info = run at the end of each run
tools.behaviorSpace.timeLimit = Time limit
tools.behaviorSpace.timeLimit.info = stop after this many steps (0 = no limit)

# Models Library

modelsLibrary.clear = Clear
modelsLibrary.community = Go to User Community Models web page
modelsLibrary.open = Open
modelsLibrary.loading = Loading Models Library...
